mouseDragged

public void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
When the mouse is dragged to the left, the camera follows the cursor left. When the mouse is dragged to the right, the camera follows the cursor right.

Specified by:
mouseDragged in interface java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
